item.title: Disentanglement Learning
item.description: List noticeable papers, code and datasets on the topic of Disentanglement Learning Disentanglement Learning [1] InfoGAN- Interpretable Representation Learning by Information Maximizing Generative Adversarial Nets, NIPS16. paper, code [2] BetaVAE-LEARNING BASIC VISUAL CONCEPTS WITH A CONSTRAINED VARIATIONAL FRAMEWORK, ICLR17. paper, code [3] Disentangling by Factorising, ICML18. paper. [4] Isolating Sources of Disentanglement in VAEs, NIPS18. paper, code [5] Information Constraints on Auto-Encoding Variational Bayes, NIPS18. paper. Dataset [1] dSprites - Disentanglement testing Sprites dataset.

item.title: Generative Adversarial Networks
item.description: List noticeable papers, code and datasets on the topic of Generative Adversarial Networks Generative Adversarial Networks [1] Original Generative Adversarial Networks from Ian Goodfellow, NIPS14. paper. [2] Unsupervised Representation Learning with Deep Convolutional Generative Adversarial Networks, ICLR16. paper, code, tutorial from Tensorflow. Dataset [1] dSprites - Disentanglement testing Sprites dataset. code

item.title: Useful Sources
item.description: This is a list of interesting sources collected by us
